posts.post_content: Donie Bush graded SGC30, shows part of two backs, it's also miscut top to bottom(see front scan), but unfortunately doesn't show part of another back. $65 dlvd, or for $100 you can have the Murray too with the miscut Piedmont back and the 1914 coupon from the Factory 42 NC(famous for the tough Piedmont 350-460 back)
